<!-- FIGURE 2: SCATTERPOLOT WITH 45 DEGREE LINE -->
<script>
Plotly.d3.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cieb-unibas/female_inventors/main/Report/female_inventors_graduates_USPTO.csv", function(err, rows){

  function unpack(rows, key) {
  return rows.map(function(row) { return row[key]; });
}

  var data = [{
      type: 'scatter',
      mode: 'markers',
      x: unpack(rows, 'female_share_graduates'),
      y: unpack(rows, 'female_share_inventors'),
      text: unpack(rows, 'inv_ctry')
    }]
    
  var layout = {
    xaxis: {range: [0, 0.75], tickformat: ',.1%', 
            title: {text: 'Female Graduate Share in Natural Sciences <br> (2010-2017 Average)'},
            showgrid: false},
    yaxis: {range: [0, 0.6], tickformat: ',.1%',
            title: {text: 'Female Inventor Share <br> (2010-2017 Average)'},
            showgrid: false},

    shapes: [{
      type: 'line',
      x0: 0,
      y0: 0,
      x1: 1,
      y1: 1,
      line: {dash: 'dot'}
    }]
};

Plotly.newPlot('plot_2', data, layout)
});
</script>

<!-- FIGURE 3: SCATTERPOLOT FOR COUNTRY COMPARISON -->
<script>
Plotly.d3.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cieb-unibas/female_inventors/main/Report/female_inventors_graduates_USPTO.csv", function(err, rows){

  function unpack(rows, key) {
  return rows.map(function(row) { return row[key]; });
}

  var data = [{
      type: 'scatter',
      mode: 'markers+text',
      x: unpack(rows, 'female_share_graduates'),
      y: unpack(rows, 'female_share_inventors'),
      text: unpack(rows, 'inv_ctry'),
      textposition: 'top center'
    }]
    
  var layout = {
    xaxis: {range: [0.4, 0.75], tickformat: ',.1%',
            title: {text: 'Female Graduate Share in Natural Sciences <br> (2010-2017 Average)'},
            showgrid: false},
    yaxis: {range: [0, 0.35], tickformat: ',.1%',
            title: {text: 'Female Inventor Share <br> (2010-2017 Average)'},
            showgrid: false, showline: true},
    shapes: [
    {
      type: 'line',
      x0: 0.522,
      y0: 0,
      x1: 0.522,
      y1: 0.35,
      line: {dash: 'dot'}
    },
    {
      type: 'line',
      x0: 0.4,
      y0: 0.105,
      x1: 0.75,
      y1: 0.105,
      line: {dash: 'dot'}
    }
    ]
};

Plotly.newPlot('plot_3', data, layout)
});
</script>
